item.dc:creator: @the_one90 the one90
item.description:
@the_one90 wrote:

Join this game updates are fast and good and looking always staff members !

Benefits as Promoter/Moderator/Sale manager :

  • From each p2p player you bring on game you get 50% of the money -> What that mean? If a player brought by you will pay/donate to server 10$, you get 50% of that amount. Payments will be done on 20th each month !!!.
  • 20% discount on all Item Shop payments.
  • Moderator status on game.
  • Moderator status on forums.

Slayer is good !
Admin is working on new skills
New slayer bosses coming and all those things :=)
U can smith dragon !!!

Join and

item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

[center][b]CHAPTER V

Client download link : http://www.fileshare.ro/e30737052

• Maximum skill lvl is 85.

• New armours and weapons are : Full Dragon + weapons.

• Level required for Dragon is 85 attack for weapons and 85 defense for armours.

• New potions are : Range potion, Incredible attack potion, Magic fletching potion, Incredible strength potion & Magic crafting potion.

• New fishes you can catch are : Shark, Giant carp & Sea turtle.

• New food you can cook is : Shark, Giant carp & Sea turtle.

• New ores to mine are : Runite ore.

• New bars to smelt are : Runite bar.

• New armours you can smith : Full Adamantite & Full rune set.

• Rune plate mail body, Dragon full helmet, Dragon plate mail body, Dragon plate mail legs & Dragon kite shield can only be smithed.

• Available mobs to fight : lvl 1 – 200.

• New trees to cut : Magic tree.

• New logs to fletch : Magic logs.

• New mobs/stalls/chest to thieve : Spice stall, Paladin chest, Gnome & Hero.

• New gems u can cut : none.

• New items u can craft : Diamond amulet, Dragon necklace & Dragon amulet.

• New arrows you can fletch : Runite arrows.

• Available Slayer Tasks : Low, Medium, Hight & Elite lvl ones.

• New runes to craft : none

• Lesser & Greaters drops adamantite items.

• Blue dragon & Green dragons drop rune items, they can be found inside Underground Pass. (You need 40 Slayer to enter Underground Pass).

• Red dragon & Black dragons drop dragon items, they can be found inside Waterfall Dungeon. (You need 50 Slayer to enter Waterfall Dungeon).

• Chaos Druids (lvl 19), Druids (lvl 29) & Chaos Druid Warrior (lvl 54) are the only mobs in game which drop HERBS for herblaw !

• To start herblaw you have to complete “Druidic Ritual Quest” first.[/b][/center]
[b]

All the best,
NL Admin !

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

[quote=“Z Prototype, post:29, topic:543403”]When will you guys realise that no one wants a sub island, no one wants sub benefits. The reason why these servers all fail within a few months is you’ve just done exactly what so many others have done. Just taken the source code and asked people to pay to play it.

Just make a decent server. The money comes after that. It’s a hobby project to have an RSC server, not a money making opportunity. Jesus.[/quote]

Thank you for your feedback Z but well you see i dont keep this server runing for $. Im not forcing anyone to pay for sub, but if they feel like they can help server by paying for a monthly sub they will pay. I will run this server like i started -> with my own money and that not bother me somehow. Im also working on a complete new project for RSC with 95% custom landscape and also all items will be rewriten, npc/mobs will be rewriten and will have lots of new items and mobs. More infos about that project will be posted when i will release beta version. (6 weeks is my ETA -> not including the map in those 6 weeks)

[center][b]New Life RSC update list — 20.07.2014

Client download links :

  1. http://www.fileshare.ro/e30713478
  2. http://www.megafileupload.com/en/file/551550/NL-Client-v4-rar.html

Lesser demon use now following rates :

coins - 58%
fire rune - 12%
law rune - 8%
nature rune - 8%
addy legs & kite - 3%
addy helm & baxe - 4%

Greater demon use now following rates :

coins - 58%
fire rune - 10%
law rune - 8%
nature rune - 8%
addy helm & baxe - 4%
addy kite & legs - 3%
addy pl8 body & 2h - 1%

Blue dragon use now following rates :

coins - 60%
laws - 6%
air & fire - 8%
bloods - 6%
rune helm & baxe - 3%
rune kite & chain - 2%

Green dragon use now following rates :

coins - 60%
laws - 5%
air & fire - 8%
bloods - 6%
rune helm & baxe - 3%
rune kite & chain - 2%
rune 2h - 1%

Runecrafting xp is incrased with ~ 25%
From lvl 2 runecraft you start getting more runes from one essence
Moss giants & Fire giants drops are now added
Hobgoblins drop now 2 laws instead of 1
Rune set+8 now give the correct armour/weapon points
Max lvl a skill can reach is now 78
Max combat lvl you can reach is 97[/b][/center]

All the best,
NL Admin !

Read full topic

[center][b] UPDATES

  1. Ice Giants drops has been added successfully.

  2. Blue Dragons are implemented and drops : baxe, legs, kite, chain, helm.

  3. Green Dragons are now implemented and drop : r2h, baxe, legs, kite, chain, helm.

  5. West Ardougne is now open.

  9. Maximum stat lvl has been incrased to 72.

  11. Fatigue is removed from skill list.

  12. Slayer xp has been incrased for high lvl tasks (lvl 65-123).

  13. Wildy Teleporter is now added in Edgeville between Man Hut & Guard Hut. [/b][/center]

item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

[center]For start I want to thank everyone for nice posts and I am proud to have devoted players like you on my server. As you know I work hard to make this server unique and now I managed to finish chapter 4. Will share some information about this chapter down here.[/center]

[center][b]CHAPTER IV

Client download : http://www.fileshare.ro/e30682693

• Incrased XP rate to 8x for non-subs and 9.5x for subs.

• Maximum lvl combat is 66.

• New armours and weapons are : Full Rune + weapons.

• Level required for Rune is 65 attack for weapons and 65 defense for armours.

• New potions are : Super defense potion.

• New fishes you can catch are :none.

• New food you can cook is : none.

• New ores to mine are : Adamantite ore.

• New bars to smelt are : Adamantite bar.

• New armours you can smith : Full Mithril & first half of Adamantite set.

• Plate mail body armours can’t be obtained as a mob drop, you have to smith them(apply for each set from Rune to Dragon).

• Available mobs to fight : lvl 1 – 110.

• New trees to cut : Yew tree.

• New logs to fletch : Yew logs.

• New mobs/stalls/chest to thieve : Spice stall, Blood rune chest.

• New gems u can cut : none.

• New items u can craft : Diamond necklace.

• New arrows you can fletch : Adamantite arrows.

• Available Slayer Tasks : Medium lvl ones & High lvl ones.

• New runes to craft : Death, Blood and Soul.

• Chaos Druids (lvl 19), Druids (lvl 29) & Chaos Druid Warrior (lvl 54) are the only mobs in game which drop HERBS for herblaw !

• To start herblaw you have to complete “Druidic Ritual Quest” first.
[/b][/center]
All the best,
NL Admin !

item.dc:creator: @trrevorr trrevorr
item.description:
@trrevorr wrote:

[size=12pt]I have never played on a rsc private server like this one. Taking the graphics and play style from rsc and making it very unique is exactly what the admin is doing on this server. Xp rates increase as the game is fully released (releases the game in chapters) but is still very easy to level up any skill you want. Very friendly and helpful community and staff. Admin is very personable and extremely nice. Any sort of question you may have he is always happy to answer you and only wants to interact with everyone and become friends. Everyone should really consider trying this server out and supporting this awesome idea! Server is awsssommmmeeeeee!!![/size]

Read full topic

Client download links :

Link 2 : http://www.megafileupload.com/en/file/547069/NL-RSC-Client-rar.html

Link 3 : http://up.ht/TFnlaR

  1. Master Fisher is now on Sub Island too.

  2. Adamantite large helmet, long sword, chain mail body, hatchet axe and pickaxe are now available in shops.

  3. Baby blue dragons & Hobgoblins are now added on Sub Island.

  4. Replaced iron rock on sub island.

  5. Broken rune ess rock is now removed from guild.

  6. Addy items price are incrased.

  7. Combat stats are now removed from in-game Highscore list.

  8. Flax is now left clickable.

  9. Incrased low lvl herbs drop rate.

  10. Lesser Demon & Greater Demon are now added and they drop adamantite items (plate body, 2h, battleaxe, legs and kite).

  11. Smithing table was modified. We removed : dagger, medium, short, mace, scimitar, darts from smithing table list because they will be replaced with new armours in a future chapter.

  12. Xp rates are incrased to 5x & 6.2x.

  13. In week-ends xp will be incrased with 1.5x !!

All the best,
NL Admin !

item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

[center][size=12pt]CHAPTER III – Adamantite Revolution[/size] [/center]

*** Client Download Link : http://www.fileshare.ro/e30657523 ***

** All new players gain 7 days free SUB between 30.06.2014 - 07.07.2014 **

• Incrased XP rate to 3x for non-subs and 3.5x for subs.

• Maximum lvl combat is 55.

• New armours and weapons are : Full adamantite + weapons.

• Level required for Addy is 55 attack for weapons and 55 defense for armours.

• New potions are : Restore Pray potion, Super attack potion, Fishing potion & Super strength potion.

• New fishes you can catch are : Lobster, Bass, Swordfish.

• New food you can cook is : Lobster, Bass, Swordfish.

• New ores to mine are : Rune ess & Mithril ore.

• New bars to smelt are : Mithril bar.

• New armours you can smith : Full steel & Mithril (without : plate body, plate mail legs and 2h ).

• Plate mail body armours can’t be obtained as a mob drop, you have to smith them(available for each set from Addy to Dragon).

• Available mobs to fight : lvl 1 – 72.

• New trees to cut : Maple tree.

• New logs to fletch : Maple logs.

• New mobs/stalls/chest to thieve : Fur stall, Silver stall, Ardougne coins chest, Guard & Knight.

• New gems u can cut : Diamond & Dragon.

• New items u can craft : Ruby necklace, Ruby amulet, Diamond ring.

• New arrows you can fletch : Mithril arrows.

• Available Slayer Tasks : Medium lvl ones.

• New runes to craft : Air, Fire, Earth, Body, Mind, Water, Chaos, Cosmic, Nature & Law.

• Chaos Druids (lvl 19), Druids (lvl 29) & Chaos Druid Warrior (lvl 54) are the only mobs in game which drop HERBS for herblaw !

• To start herblaw you have to complete “Druidic Ritual Quest” first.

All the best,
NL Admin !

item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

26.06.2014 New Life RSC Server Updates :

  1. Implemented +4 and +5 Jewels.

  2. Black armour and weapons can go to +5 now.

  3. Mithril armour and weapons can go to +5 now.

  4. Super set is added now as long as next chapter you will be able to make super attack.

  5. Completed a preview for the lvl 100 armour.

  6. Cleaned useless items from source and removed them from shops/drops/map.

  7. Added cosmic, natures and law runes to Hobgoblins lvl 32 drop.

  8. Added cosmic, natures, laws and death runes to Giant lvl 37 drop.

  9. Fixed F2P area in wild so you can’t use P2P items anymore.

  10. Wrote base for Justice minigame (next chater will be available).

  11. Wrote base for GiftBox (next chapter will be available).

  12. Incrased XP to 3x & 3.5x !

  13. Removed aggro from Jailguards.

  14. Added Master Fisher with free Trouts in Edge & Mycena City (starting city).

Client download : http://www.fileshare.ro/e30647955
